question: What will be the US CPI inflation rate for [MONTH] [YEAR]?
description: Predict the year-over-year Consumer Price Index (CPI) inflation rate. Last reported: [LAST_RATE]%
resolutionCriteria:
This market resolves using the official year-over-year CPI inflation rate published by the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) for [MONTH] [YEAR].

The final rate will be scaled to 2 decimal places (e.g., 3.25% = 325) for settlement.
Only the official BLS CPI release will be used as the data source.
Revisions published after the initial release will not affect resolution.
Market range: [MIN_VALUE_FORMATTED]% - [MAX_VALUE_FORMATTED]%
